snippet: Robert J. McCann, the chief of UBS's American business, is going back to the Merrill playbook in his effort to restore the beleaguered bank's fortunes, tapping three former Merrill colleagues to the bank's executive committee.
abstract: Robert J. McCann, the chief of UBS's American business, is going back to the Merrill playbook in his effort to restore the beleaguered bank's fortunes, tapping three former Merrill colleagues to the bank's executive committee.
